name: gigapaste
description: GigaPaste is a self-hosted pastebin application that supports syntax highlighting, expiration controls, and public or private snippets. Ideal for sharing logs, code, or notes within development or teaching environments.
features: Syntax Highlighting: Display code snippets with language-specific syntax highlighting for improved readability.
Expiration Controls: Set automatic expiration times for pastes to ensure temporary sharing and cleanup.
Privacy Options: Create public or private snippets with optional password protection for sensitive content.
Code Sharing: Share logs, code, and text snippets quickly within development or teaching environments.
Multiple Languages: Support for numerous programming languages and markup formats.
Simple Interface: Minimal, distraction-free UI focused on quick paste creation and viewing.
Self-Hosted Security: Keep shared content on your own infrastructure without third-party dependencies.
Team Collaboration: Facilitate code review and debugging by sharing snippets internally.
